title: El Salvador has arrested 3,319 minors and sentenced almost 600 as part of anti-gang crackdown
description: SAN SALVADOR, El Salvador — A rights report released Tuesday says the government of El Salvador has arrested 3,319 underage suspects and sentenced 579 to prison terms during the harsh 2 1/2 year-old crackdown on street gangs.
